EmailTemplate.name: 18-TEPS-Energy-Email-Eblast UTC-T0020U.Invite
EmailTemplate.subject: Join us at UTC Telecom and Technology
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
${preheader} View as web page <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> Join us at UTC Telecom and Technology - Discuss with us how a dynamic but secure communications architecture can enable innovation and support your future. - Check out our new extended private LTE network solution with CBRS support and how it’s ready for 5G. - Discover your gateway to innovation with our new trans-Atlantic test lab capabilities and extensive use case library.
Experience new key capabilities to help transition to a next gen utility with new business models.
Plan to attend exciting conference sessions
Transition to a converged IP/MPLS network – John Alberti (Oncor) and Hansen Chan (Nokia), Thursday, May 10, 3:15 – 3:45 pm
Microwave Communications –George Kizer (TeleVision) and Jay Devadoss (Southern California Edison),Thursday, May 10, 4:30 – 5:30 pm
To schedule a booth tour or meeting, please contact Maryann Welsh <[[mailto:maryann.welsh@nokia.com]]>.
For more information on Nokia solutions, visit our webpage <[[https://networks.nokia.com/power-utilities/smart-grid?did=d000000000ci&utm_campaign=utilities_moderniz.&utm_source=nurture&utm_medium=email]]>. Connect with us © {{my.CopyrightYear}} Nokia. Contact us <[[{{my.ContactUs}}]]> | Privacy policy <[[{{my.PrivacyPolicy}}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]> You are receiving this email because you've subscribed to receive information from Nokia.
